snippet.title: The Enchanted Cave 2 MEGA UPDATE Trailer
snippet.description:
The MEGA UPDATE is a free update that brings tons of new content to the game on all platforms including:

*New challenge modes
*Full controller support on desktop versions
*New Heroes, monsters, items, and NPCs
*Cross-platform save transfer feature
...and much more!

Read more about the update here:
http://dustinauxier.com/the-enchanted-cave-2-mega-update-and-price-change

Test out the beta today on steam!
http://steamcommunity.com/app/368610/discussions/0/1696043263509986589/
